headline: Tell HN: Pinebook Pro is a $219 brick
description: Just got my Pinebook Pro, installed the default Manjaro Plasma (you can't get that wrong), after reboot, I was asked to apply updates. I did and after a reboot the machine is completely bricked. Many people on Reddit share the same experience! I wish I've search Reddit before throwing $260 down the drain!
headline_zh-Hans: 告诉HN：Pinebook Pro是一块219美元的砖头
headline_zh-Hant: 告訴HN：Pinebook Pro是一塊219美元的磚頭
description_zh-Hans: 刚拿到我的Pinebook Pro，安装了默认的Manjaro Plasma（你不能弄错），重启后，我被要求应用更新。我照做了，重启后机器就完全瘫痪了。Reddit上的很多人都有同样的经历 我希望我在把260美元扔进下水道之前已经搜索了Reddit!
description_zh-Hant: 剛拿到我的Pinebook Pro，安裝了默認的Manjaro Plasma（你不能弄錯），重啟後，我被要求應用更新。我照做了，重啟後機器就完全癱瘓了。Reddit上的很多人都有同樣的經歷 我希望我在把260美元扔進下水道之前已經搜索了Reddit!
